hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Are you a student? para que sirve tabletas ciprofloxacino 500 mg Though Lahiri’s first language was Bengali, she has never learned to write it. Yet it must have had an effect on her prose. “Sometimes my mother will read me a story in Bengali,” she tells me, “and the style of those things she reads me is quite plain – startlingly plain, appealingly plain.” She renders the way her own words arise as an aural experience too: “The language is what I have. I didn’t hear the sentences any other way.”
